tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to denial of service when processing specially crafted XLSX files with extreme or sparse declared dimensions. Such files can trigger excessive memory allocation, potentially leading to out-of-memory conditions and application crashes. The patched version introduces safeguards that detect pathological bounding boxes and process sparse sheets safely, preventing excessive memory allocation.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `kreuzberg` library to the patch version.
